entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to flurries near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
